home.title: Les Suites du Cygne
home.subtitle: The art of Alsatian living, reimagined in a contemporary and warm atmosphere.
home.ctaReservation: Book now your stay in our exceptional suites in the heart of Colmar
home.locationCaption: A few steps from Little Venice and the historic center
home.philosophyTitle: A family home, an artist's soul.
home.philosophyText: Nestled at the gates of the old town, our Alsatian residence has been completely redesigned to offer you a haven of serenity. Far from standardized accommodation, we offer you genuine living spaces (up to 115m²), where old-world charm meets absolute comfort.
home.suitesText: From the poetry of the Baudelaire suite to the grandeur of the Asselin suite. Unique spaces for 2 to 10 people.
home.mapSubtitle: A few minutes walk from the historic center

apartments.title: Our Apartments
apartments.subtitle: Modern Comfort & Alsatian Charm
apartments.servicesText: High-speed WiFi, Air conditioning, Linens provided.

info.title: Info & Access
info.subtitle: All practical information
info.addressNote1: The suites are at n° 20, but
info.addressNote1End: (just to the right of the pharmacy)
info.addressNote3: Located only 1 km from Colmar train station
info.checkinNote1: Access via keypad and key box
info.checkinNote3: If your arrival time is not between 5:00 PM and 9:00 PM, contact us to arrange your access

extras.title: Extras & Services
extras.subtitle: Enhance your stay with our tailored options
extras.breakfastDesc: Start your day with a delicious Alsatian breakfast, prepared with local and seasonal products.
extras.breakfastItems: Fresh pastries, artisan bread, homemade jams, local cheeses, Alsatian cold cuts, fresh fruit juices, coffee and tea
extras.drinksDesc: Discover our selection of Alsace wines and artisanal beverages to enjoy in your suite.
extras.wineSelection: Selection of white wines (Riesling, Gewurztraminer, Pinot Gris)
extras.servicesDesc: Take advantage of our services to make your stay even more enjoyable.
extras.conciergeDesc: Restaurant reservations, show tickets, personalized advice
extras.transferDesc: Shuttle service from Colmar station or airport
extras.bookExtrasDesc: To book these services, contact us directly by email or phone when making your reservation.

reservation.title: Book
reservation.subtitle: Best rate guaranteed direct
reservation.heading: Your stay begins here
reservation.text: For any request, please contact us directly. We respond within 24 hours.
reservation.bookingDescription: Book your suite in just a few clicks via our secure booking system
reservation.teamAvailable: Our team is at your disposal for any questions

footer.description: An invitation to the Alsatian art of living, in an authentic and refined setting.
